sentence: that is a shame because we much prefer the design pools restaurants and location of Cosmo
it is a tad on the exspensive side and it does seem to try and cater to the grey goose war with alot of posers at the pool and bar areas
The hotel is a whole experience in itself casinos shops restaurants pools nightclub anything you want really and right in the centre of the strip
The swimming pools were shut as we were just out of season a bit disappointing as it was only just November and still lovely and warm
i presume it is normal for LV goers but starting with the obligatory casino you can move up through the floors to 24 hour fitness 3 pools 14 restaurants and so on
The bungalow was connected to the club so when we walked out the back door we at the real live party or in day time we at the pool area
The pool was turned into a skating rink for the holiday and they have fire pits to enjoy
Three swimming pools to choose from bar service we were really were spoilt for choice
This time of year only one of the three pools is open and I understand that we got lucky with 78 degrees however the pool was not very nice regardless
The hotel pools have fake palm trees which is completely tacky and only one or two cocktail waitresses on staff
POLTwo great pools but again very busy from Thursday through Sunday
The entire hotel is spotles the rooms public bathrooms pool areas Etc
The views were amazing and the pools were nice but for the money I had expect a little bit more
There are always plenty of colorful characters floating around
Lots of restaurants two really nice pools spa gym etc
the details in all the rooms restaurants and pool areas are beautiful
the spa where I had my hair done for an evening out was great and the pool and pool bar and restaurant were great along with the lovely bars in the casino
I found Secret Pizza and it was an expensive delight The Chelsea pool was pretty nice and had more than enough chairs and cabanas

we were so glad we found out about it the pizza was to die forThe pools were really nice we went to the one on the higher level more often than not as it was a little quieter the lower pool has more of a party atmoshere
Fantastic restaurants pools amenities casino and bars
